headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Vulcan Materials (VMC) After Strong Multi Year Share Price Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Vulcan Materials is offering good value at its current share price, this article walks through the key numbers that matter before you make up your mind. The stock last closed at US$300.54, with returns of 0.0% over 7 days, 2.7% over 30 days, 2.7% year to date, 11.7% over 1 year, 69.4% over 3 years and 102.9% over 5 years. This provides plenty of history to weigh up against its current price. Recent coverage has focused on Vulcan Materials as a major supplier to...

headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Vulcan Materials and Martin Marietta Materials
summary: Vulcan Materials stands to gain as sustained infrastructure spending and firm pricing power fuel multi-year growth in concrete and aggregates.
